Name: Escape From Eternity
About the game: 'ESCAPE FROM ETERNITY' is an arcade game about jordan, a former demonic soldier who seeks freedom, he has an infinite ammo rifle where he destroys any creature that tries to stop his path, escape from eternity was made to give you an adrenaline injection in a few minutes of gameplay, soon escape from eternity will receive other game modes and updates that will leave the game with an extravagant experience escape from eternity has immersive and cool gameplay simple and easy mechanics
